content: embellish your fall creations with these crocheted **mushroom appliques** the pattern is available in two sizes a **small** mushroom and a **large** mushroom *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** 3 5 mm e/4 usa 9 uk crochet hook dk 3 light yarn tapestry needle **yarn** i used **paintbox yarns simply dk** *302 yds / 276 m per 100 g* in the following colors **red** rose red 113 **white** champagne white 102 feel free to use any yarn with the appropriate hook **size** when crocheted with dk acrylic yarn and a 3 5-mm hook you can expect the following sizes **large mushroom** 2 1 by 2 8 5 3 by 7 cm **small mushroom** 1 8 by 2 4 5 by 5 2 cm when crocheted with dk cotton yarn and a 3 0-mm hook you can expect the following sizes **large mushroom** 1 6 by 2 4 by 5 2 cm **small mushroom** 1 3 by 1 5 3 3 by 3 9 cm **gauge** this pattern is too small to accurately determine the gauge **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
